content: **crocheted hat in drops andes the piece is worked in the round top down with double crochets ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern an-073 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes ** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm height 23-24-25 cm **yarn** drops andes from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 200-200-200 g colour 6928 royal blue **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 7 mm **crochet gauge** 10 double crochets in width and 11 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
